name: Silversong Elven Village
description: An ancient elven settlement among the trees
author: Misthollow Team

11000.title: Forest Path to Silversong
11000.description:
The forest path opens into a glade where the trees grow impossibly tall
and straight. Silver-barked trees tower overhead, their leaves
shimmering with an inner light. The air is sweet with the scent of
flowers and alive with birdsong. Delicate bridges and platforms can be
seen high in the branches - this is the edge of an elven settlement. The
path continues south back to the forest, or north deeper into elven
lands. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

11001.title: Village Green
11001.description:
A circular clearing serves as the heart of the village. Grass as soft as
velvet covers the ground, and wildflowers grow in artful arrangements.
Ancient trees ring the clearing, their trunks carved with intricate
patterns that glow faintly. Rope ladders and spiral staircases wind up
the massive trees to dwellings in the canopy. The beauty and harmony of
this place is almost overwhelming. Shadows gather in the corners. The
air is still and musty.

11002.title: The Moonwell
11002.description:
A perfectly circular pool of crystal-clear water sits at the center of a
grove. The water glows with soft silver light even during the day, and
at night it shines like captured moonlight. Flowers of extraordinary
beauty grow around its rim, and the air shimmers with magic. This is a
moonwell, a sacred site of the elves, where the barrier between worlds
is thin. The water is said to have healing properties. Shadows gather in
the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

11003.title: Archery Range
11003.description:
This long glade has been cleared for archery practice. Targets made of
straw and wood are set up at various distances, some near, others barely
visible. The ground is littered with arrows, many still quivering in
their targets. Elven archers practice here relentlessly, honing their
legendary skill. Targets are set at distances that would be impossible
for humans, yet the elves hit them with casual ease. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Shadows gather in the corners.

11004.title: The Ancient Grove
11004.description:
This grove contains the oldest trees in the forest, their trunks so
massive that ten men could not encircle them. They predate the elven
settlement by millennia and are revered as sacred. The trees here have
awareness - you can feel their presence, ancient and vast. Druids and
rangers come here to commune with nature and learn the old magic. A
treant guardian stands eternal watch. The air is still and musty. Dust
motes drift in the stale air.

11005.title: Canopy Walkway
11005.description:
Suspended bridges connect the tree dwellings high above the ground. The
walkways sway gently in the breeze, but they're much sturdier than they
appear. From this height, Visible is for miles across the forest canopy.
Birds flit between branches, and the occasional squirrel scampers past.
The view is breathtaking, but the drop is dizzying. Shadows gather in
the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

11006.title: Fletcher's Workshop
11006.description:
This ground-level workshop is dedicated to the craft of bow and arrow
making. Racks hold dozens of bows in various stages of completion - some
just shaped wood, others finished masterpieces. Bundles of arrows sorted
by type fill barrels. Feathers, sinew, glue, and exotic woods cover
every work surface. A master fletcher works here, creating weapons of
legendary quality. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

11007.title: Druid Circle
11007.description:
Standing stones form a perfect circle here, each carved with nature
symbols and runes. The grass within grows in a spiral pattern, and
mushrooms spring up overnight. This is a place of power where druids and
rangers commune with the spirits of nature. Animals approach fearlessly
here, and plants grow with unnatural vigor. The air hums with primal
magic. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

11008.title: Elder's Tree Home
11008.description:
This dwelling is carved into the trunk of one of the largest trees, its
interior surprisingly spacious. Windows look out over the forest in all
directions, and the walls are lined with shelves holding ancient books
and scrolls. Comfortable furnishings of living wood grow from the floor.
This is the home of the village elder, keeper of lore and wisdom. The
scent of herbs and incense fills the air. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

11009.title: Observation Platform
11009.description:
This platform extends far out from the main tree, providing an
unobstructed view in all directions. Elven scouts use this post to watch
for intruders. A spyglass on a swivel mount allows observation of
distant locations. From here, Visible is the boundaries of elven
territory and beyond - the forest, the swamp to the south, and mountains
to the east. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Shadows
gather in the corners.

11010.title: Companion Bonding Grounds
11010.description:
This peaceful glade is where rangers and druids come to bond with animal
companions. Several creatures - wolves, hawks, bears - move freely
through the area, unafraid of people. They are wild animals, but some
may choose to bond with a worthy ranger. Stone benches are arranged in a
circle, and a small shrine to nature deities stands at the center. The
bond formed here lasts a lifetime. Dust motes drift in the stale air.
Shadows gather in the corners.

11011.title: Shadowed Path
11011.description:
The forest grows darker here, the trees closer together and their
branches more entangled. This path marks the boundary between the
protected village and the wild forest beyond. Elven magic keeps
corruption at bay, but it's a constant struggle. Strange sounds echo
from deeper in the woods, and shadows move in ways they shouldn't. The
elves post guards here day and night. Dust motes drift in the stale air.
Shadows gather in the corners.

11012.title: Corrupted Grove
11012.description:
Something is terribly wrong here. The trees are twisted and blackened,
their leaves withered and dead. The ground is covered in sickly moss
that squelches underfoot. Dark magic has tainted this place, and the
corruption is spreading slowly toward the village. Corrupted sprites
flit through the dying trees, and shadow stalkers hunt in the darkness.
The elves are greatly concerned. Shadows gather in the corners. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

11013.title: Heart of Corruption
11013.description:
At the center of the corrupted grove lies the source - a massive dead
tree, its trunk split open to reveal pulsing darkness within. This was
once a sacred tree, but something has twisted it into an abomination.
Shadow energy radiates from it like heat from a fire. Defeating the
corruption here might save the grove, but the source of darkness is
powerful and well-defended. The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift
in the stale air.

11014.title: Training Hall
11014.description:
This building on the forest floor serves as a training facility for
elven warriors and rangers. Practice dummies, target posts, and weapon
racks line the walls. Young elves practice their forms here under the
watchful eyes of veterans. The hall is open-air, with a roof but no
walls, allowing trainees to stay connected with nature while they hone
their skills. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch.

11000.name: elven archer
11000.long_desc: An elf in forest green leather draws an arrow with fluid grace.
11000.description: This elf embodies the grace and deadliness of their people. Tall and slim with the ageless beauty of elvenkind, they move with liquid fluidity. Their longbow is a masterwork of wood and magic, and a quiver of arrows hangs at their hip. Centuries of practice have made them a legendary marksman. Their eyes are alert, missing nothing.

11001.name: treant
11001.long_desc: An enormous tree-like being stands here, its bark-covered form radiating ancient power.
11001.description: This treant is one of the oldest living things in the forest. Standing over twenty feet tall, it appears to be an ancient oak tree - until it moves. Massive limbs serve as arms, and roots pull free of the earth to become legs. Its face is carved into the trunk, with eyes like knotholes that glow with inner light. It speaks in a voice like wind through branches, slow and deliberate. The treant guards the ancient grove with unwavering dedication.

11002.name: corrupted sprite
11002.long_desc: A small winged creature flits about erratically, trailing dark mist.
11002.description: This sprite was once a beautiful nature spirit, but corruption has twisted it into something ugly. Its wings are tattered and leak black ichor, and its eyes glow with malevolent red light. Where normal sprites trail stardust and bring joy, this one spreads decay and misery. The corruption that took the grove also claimed these innocent spirits, turning them into agents of darkness.

11003.name: shadow stalker
11003.short_desc: a shadowy figure that moves like smoke
11003.long_desc: A creature of living darkness hunts silently through the corrupted grove.
11003.description: This being seems to be made of shadow given form and malice. It has a vaguely humanoid shape but no distinct features - just darkness in the outline of a predator. When it moves, it flows like smoke, silent and deadly. Red eyes gleam in the void of its head. These creatures are spawn of the corruption, feeding on life and light to sustain their unnatural existence.

11004.name: village elder
11004.long_desc: An ancient elf studies a tome with eyes that have seen centuries pass.
11004.description: Silvithiel is impossibly old even by elven standards. Her silver hair flows like moonlight, and her eyes hold the wisdom of ages. Despite her apparent frailty, power radiates from her like heat from a flame. She is the keeper of lore, advisor to the people, and guardian of ancient secrets. She worries deeply about the spreading corruption and seeks heroes brave enough to face it.

11005.name: master fletcher
11005.long_desc: A skilled elf carefully shapes a bow with expert hands.
11005.description: Aerendil has devoted his long life to the craft of bow-making. His hands move with the precision of centuries of practice, shaping wood into instruments of deadly beauty. He can judge the quality of wood at a glance and knows which trees will yield the finest bows. His shop contains the finest ranged weapons in the realm.

11006.name: wolf
11006.long_desc: A gray wolf watches you with intelligent eyes.
11006.description: This wolf is larger and more intelligent than normal. It moves with fluid grace, muscles rippling under its thick fur. These wolves sometimes bond with worthy rangers, becoming loyal companions for life. This one seems interested in you, evaluating whether you're worthy of its loyalty.

11007.name: hawk
11007.long_desc: A hawk perches on a branch, its keen eyes scanning for prey.
11007.description: This hawk is a magnificent specimen with sharp talons and piercing eyes. Hawks make excellent companions for rangers, serving as scouts and messengers. This one seems unusually intelligent and might bond with the right person.

11000.name: elven bread
11000.long_desc: A wrapped loaf of pale bread sits here.
11000.description: This is lembas, the waybread of the elves. One small bite fills the belly and restores energy. It stays fresh for months without spoiling. The elves give this to travelers setting out on long journeys.

11001.name: healing potion
11001.long_desc: A crystal vial filled with glowing water sits here.
11001.description: This vial contains water drawn from the sacred moonwell. It glows with soft silver light and has powerful healing properties. One sip can cure wounds and purge poison from the body.

11002.name: elven cloak
11002.long_desc: A cloak of forest green hangs from a peg.
11002.description: This cloak is woven from spider silk and enchanted fibers. It's incredibly light and practically weightless, yet provides surprising warmth. The color shifts subtly to match surroundings, granting its wearer improved concealment in natural settings.

11003.name: nature's tear
11003.long_desc: A crystal that looks like a frozen teardrop glows softly.
11003.description: This crystal formed from a treant's tears, shed in sorrow over the corruption of the grove. It holds powerful nature magic and could be used to purify tainted land - or crafted into a powerful magical item by a skilled enchanter.

11010.name: elven longbow
11010.long_desc: A beautiful longbow of white wood rests in a display.
11010.description: This bow is a work of art and a deadly weapon. Made from ancient yew wood and reinforced with magic, it's both powerful and graceful. Elvish runes etched along its length glow faintly. The bowstring is woven from unicorn hair. In the hands of a skilled archer, this bow is deadly at incredible range.

11011.name: quiver of arrows
11011.long_desc: A leather quiver filled with arrows hangs here.
11011.description: This quiver contains two dozen arrows of elven make. Each is perfectly straight and balanced, fletched with hawk feathers. The arrowheads are steel, sharp enough to pierce armor. These arrows fly true and hit hard.

11012.name: short bow
11012.long_desc: A compact bow of dark wood rests here.
11012.description: This short bow is lighter and more maneuverable than a longbow, perfect for use in forests where space is limited. While it lacks the range of a longbow, it's easier to use and faster to draw.

11013.name: leather armor
11013.short_desc: a suit of elven leather armor
11013.long_desc: Finely crafted leather armor hangs on display.
11013.description: This armor is made from the finest leather, supple yet strong. It's been treated with oils and magic to enhance its protective qualities while maintaining flexibility. The craftsmanship is superb - every seam perfect, every buckle secure.

11018.name: elven focus crystal
11018.room_desc: An elven focus crystal lies here.

11001.name: elf
11001.long_desc: An elven villager goes about their daily tasks.

11002.name: guard
11002.long_desc: An elven guard stands watch, bow at the ready.

11003.name: elder
11003.long_desc: A wise elven elder sits in contemplation.

11004.name: merchant
11004.long_desc: An elven merchant displays fine crafts and goods.

11005.name: child
11005.long_desc: An elven child plays among the trees.

11006.name: ranger
11006.long_desc: An elven ranger patrols the village perimeter.

11007.name: healer
11007.long_desc: An elven healer tends to herbs and poultices.

11008.name: spider
11008.long_desc: A large spider has wandered in from the forest.

11098.name: elven bard
11098.long_desc: An elven bard sits upon a mossy stone here, fingers dancing across a silver-stringed lute.
11098.description: Her voice carries an otherworldly beauty that makes the very leaves lean closer to listen. Centuries of wisdom lie behind her ageless eyes, and her music seems to make the forest itself breathe deeper.

talk_responses.hello: The bard's melody fades to silence. 'Silversong was ancient when the first humans drew breath. Every tree here remembers the world's beginning. The corruption in the dark forest to the south is a wound that festers — we sing to keep it from spreading. Listen to the trees, traveler. They whisper warnings to those who know how to hear.'
talk_responses.history: She strums a mournful chord. 'A great evil was sealed beneath these roots long ago. The singing keeps the seal strong. If the music ever stops... well. That is why we bards never rest.'
talk_responses.default: The elven bard plays a haunting melody that fills you with both joy and an inexplicable sadness.
talk_responses.next: Lyralei plucks a melancholy chord. 'The forest's melody grows darker further north. But if you seek challenge beyond these woods, the Mines of Moria echo with the clash of steel, and the Dark Forest... well, few return unchanged from that place.'

11099.name: ancient treant
11099.long_desc: An enormous treant stands here, so still it could be mistaken for a particularly gnarled oak.
11099.description: Centuries of growth have given it a face-like pattern in its bark, and its 'eyes' — two deep knotholes — seem to follow movement with glacial patience. Moss hangs from its branches like a green beard.

talk_responses.hello: The treant speaks with a voice like grinding boulders. '...Hmmm. Small thing. Fast thing. You move... too quickly. The forest... has roots deeper than mountains. Patience... is the oldest strength. The dark ones... from below... they cut and burn. Stop them... if you can. We are... too slow... to fight.'
talk_responses.forest: Bark creaks as it shifts. '...The silver trees... are the heart. Protect... the heart... and the forest... survives. Harm the heart... and all... falls to shadow.'
talk_responses.default: The treant is utterly still. You're not even sure it's awake.
